title: Double homicide in Arizona linked to murder of forensic psychiatrist
content: Two women were shot dead in homicides police say are linked to the fatal shooting of forensic psychiatrist Steven Pitt outside of his law office Thursday.    The victims — Veleria Sharp, 48, and Laura Anderson, 49 — both worked as paralegals at the Law office of Burt, Feldman, Grenier in Scottsdale,...
